TopicTitle: -Realism: Kerbal Injuries and Kerbal Death Mod?-

Articles.Content:
I Hate It How Kerbals Just Turn into Dust whenever they Jump out of an Aircraft, Get Hit with an Asteroid, or Die in an Exploding Rocket. I Just Want a Simple Mod that Allows Kerbals to actually Die or Sustain Horrible Injuries rather then just Poof out of Existance. A little bit of Gore in the Mod would be a nice touch. Also Maybe the ability to Pick Up Dead Kerbal Bodies using KAS Would also add to this Mods Realism. List Of Injuries and Deaths I want to see in this Mod -Broken Bones -Brain Trauma -Organ Failure -Suicide -Getting Crushed -Murdered -Poisoning -Being Exposed to Vacuum -Being Too Badass -Chestbursters -Lack of Food -Getting incinerated -Dying From Anything That Involves a Rocket -Getting Melted -Insanity
